sources.name: UTPointsOfDiversion
sources.script:
source(output(
		WRCHEX as string,
		POD_TYPE as string,
		NS_DIRECTION as string,
		NS_DISTANCE as string,
		EW_DIRECTION as string,
		EW_DISTANCE as string,
		SECTION_CORNER as string,
		STR as string,
		DIVERTING_WORKS as string,
		POD_COMMENT as string,
		WELL_DIAMETER as string,
		WELL_DEPTH1 as string,
		WELL_DEPTH2 as string,
		WELL_YEAR_DRILLED as string,
		WELL_LOG as string,
		WIN as string,
		X_UTM as string,
		Y_UTM as string,
		ELEVATION as string,
		recordId as string,
		MANUAL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> UTPointsOfDiversion

transformations.name: DerivedPointsOfDiversion
transformations.script:
UTPointsOfDiversion derive(SiteUUID = WRCHEX,
		SiteNativeID = WRCHEX,
		SiteName = 'UT_' + WRCHEX,
		USGSSiteID = '',
		SiteTypeCV = case(POD_TYPE == '', 'Unknown'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'A', 'Abandoned'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'C', 'Sewage'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'D', 'Drain'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'F', 'Sewage'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'G', 'Spring'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'N', 'Sewage'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'P', 'Sewage'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'R', 'Point of Rediversion'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'S', 'Surface'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'T', 'Point of Return'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'U', 'Underground'),
		Longitude = 'TODO: Conversion',
		Latitude = 'TODO: Conversion',
		Geometry = '',
		CoordinateMethodCV = 'TODO: Not Nullable in DB',
		CoordinateAccuracy = '',
		GNISCodeCV = '',
		EPSGCodeCV = 'TOOD: Not Nullable in DB',
		NHDMetadataID = '') ~> DerivedPointsOfDiversion
